panels.title: Top $top_n tables by size change rate

targets.expr: topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_ins{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_del{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_hot_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

topk($top_n, sum by(schema, table_name, table_full_name) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval]) - irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_hot_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema=~"$schema_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

options.content: Brought to you by Postgres AI
